summary: The first mod i've made on Nexus so far. If there are any problems post a comment about it.
descriptionHtml:
So this mod was in development since February, and I finally finished it after a month of testing and fixes I finally released the mod. This Ragdoll includes..

:Realistic (or atleast attempted) body movements.

:Friction isn't high, this caused the ragdolls to stick to the floor like glue.

:The arms can move upwards more.

:Knees bend farther.

:Ankles bend farther.
author: ImperialOfficer
